name: p5-ascii
description: Created using p5.js, this software renders a video file as ASCII text. By iterating through the individual frames of the video file at an arbitrary resolution and averaging the color value of the pixels within these regions, we can assign each region a specific 'lightness' value with a corresponding ASCII character based on whitespace of the character.

name: sudoku
description:
A simple sudoku game. Fill in the blanks and then validate to see if you got everything correct.

Navigate through the grid with WASD/↑←↓→ and remove a number with Backspace/Delete.
